title: Dark Fae Extinction 2
description: A dark fae warrior took me captive;I am an unwilling slave, hell-bent on destroying him;But in the end, it could be me destroyed - heart and soul.Fans of CN CRAWFORD, LAURA THALASSA and JENNIFER L. ARMENTROUT will love this deliciously dark fae series.Cliff has turned from captor to lover, but I want a protector in this new, dark world.It's the one thing he won't give me, besides freedom.Keeping me tied to him, he leads the way through the darkness to find the rest of his unit.I have other plans. Plans to die before we reach the others.But with Cliff watching my every move, any form of freedom I can scrape up will be the biggest fight of my miserable life.
author: Quinn Blackbird
